item.title: 以色列似乎对伊朗的政权采取了扩大的目标 - 华盛顿邮报

item.title: 以色列 - 伊朗最新：随着冲突进入第四天 - 金融时报
item.description: 以色列 - 伊朗最新：当冲突进入第四天＆nbsp; 6f6f6f“> Financial Times 实时更新：以色列在特朗普呼吁决议＆nbsp; 《纽约时报》 伊朗必须继续以色列罢工哪些武器？＆nbsp; nbsp; 澳大利亚广播公司href =“ https://news.google.com/rss/articles/cbmiugfbvv95cuxnwfitrjded0rcdzlyz 01TEXPEZS1KYZJZNGG5V3BDWDVRR2UYTEFCEWIZBXPZR0KXB21GRZL3MDBUMVHWYMRDEHZ4AW1OA wjiymjmamrmendpdzg3zzrnvzk4bhz3qupavuc0mvg3nmxtwezowmpazghbmwjjrem2tffqmwxra k5xavzglxvsalj3cznpcg5jc3phu015agjrdk1wogrmmjcymjcya0vhm3vhm3vwq0txcnjeb3bks3c？oc = 5“ target =“ _ blank”>伊朗称赞'新方法'，导弹击中以色列的特拉维夫，海法＆nbsp; nbsp; reuters 以色列控制了伊朗的天空 - 这一壮举仍然在乌克兰逃避俄罗斯＆nbsp; 6f6f6f“> wsj

item.title: 七人峰会集团在加拿大开幕，重点是贸易，战争 - 而不是骚动特朗普 - 美联社新闻
item.description: 七个峰会的集团在加拿大开业，重点是贸易，战争 - 而不是骚扰特朗普＆nbsp; nbsp; g7是卡尼的重要时刻。这里有五件事要观看＆nbsp;＆nbsp; bbc g7峰会'关于唐纳德的全部'，因为加拿大试图避免落基山脉摩擦＆nbsp; nbsp; sky News <a href="https://news.google.com/rss/articles/CBMikwFBVV95cUxNMTA2djVhRXdQaGNPZlB4cjlPZ0FEVUZrVHgtcE13NnlCNU9vNzk4WlpBZkNhWEs2MVN UAEDHSDA4U1FOZ0EYODVBYWTRRTDTNMTGUHAGU3SWLOEENFMNVYRJDOR3ZMX05WBHJNENY3Y3Y2DCRMNIAKJKJKJKJKJVJVJVJVJVJVJVJVJVJVJVJVJVJVJVJVJVN3YUVETVN3YU4ZSSSMSMEL？ target =“ _ blank”>随着特朗普返回G7，与盟友的裂痕更深＆nbsp; nbsp; 纽约时报 加拿大的G7领导人讨论以色列 - 伊朗冲突，希望避免特朗普冲突＆nbsp; nbsp; REUTERS

item.title: 特朗普告诉以色列不要杀死伊朗的最高领导人-BBC
item.description: 特朗普告诉以色列不要杀死伊朗的最高领导人＆nbsp; nbsp; bbc 特朗普拒绝以色列计划杀害伊朗最高领导人，美国官员说＆nbsp; nbsp; href =“ https://news.google.com/rss/articles/cbmixefvx3lxte5puddqtmvrvexsxsx3g5clpwrxn1m1bhm GJPODH0QNA4YXRVAFFYNK5HV1E2DLFRCHN5T1KXUG1BBMPFC0FZAMI1VJJRRMSXNYWJLKSLPMDZDJC0LF？OC = 5“ target =“ _ blank”> trump'yabujije Israel kwica ayatollah ali khamenei wa Iran' href =“ https://news.google.com/rss/articles/cbmi5gfbvv95Cuxqcccccccccccccccccccccccnymrflvrpeg41mc14mc14mw1oul9 IC3GyoEZRSZZIYJROBXRVV1RVX3RKYV9RKYV9OVHPFRS02UKDHDHDMPWAGZHU2ITCVPSWDFVR0NYCTHBSNHLSNHLSWCWDZVSVSVSVSVSVSVSVZNUEW 41ZWRKDFKTA1LTBGVVZ0HRVKRTLVF3NLFHOWWYRWFRWYMZFZLBSTZNAVFVXZJLWNGTJTUR3LWNGNGVFFDJLVDJUVJLVHVHNUA01SCSSSSSSSSSSSSSSSC 3DJX1Z2Y2TYOHCXRGLBAKHHVK5WZHJHJHJLZNLQZTNB05ZUWPPQ2XXXEKU3R0YYVXY5RJBKKWGMZATZNUJFMZNUJFMON target =“ _ blank”>在德黑兰东北部邦克的khamenei；以色列周五没有杀死他，让他有机会屈服 - 报告＆nbsp; 以色列时代 <a href="https://news.google.com/rss/articles/CBMirAFBVV95cUxPUUd1NmE5eHRCejNDYjIyTFpCbHZhdFg4WGxZYzV0Qm9KMEVvQmczZjVLWlRoN2FqQmY3S1o4Q ktVZUNQUHBKamlITkxNbUtPeEJzR3NLcXU2VmhCdUtlTThtaWtHRXVteVg3M1hrMGZ5ckNOWTFPV2F2S2g0QUk2LUxneER6SDBsUnFRWUtzYjhqemFZN09aWkhvcFFsMGZSb 2vncjj6atl1tlpf0ggyaufvx3lxtfbpx215lwhamhe1y09xrku0xzlsujdlsxnmbwf SZ1LGZK4TY1HEVLRZDVPHNUG2TND6WMLYYKM1SGJQBDNPSZZGV2JPMDMDM3RM1XOTG1O E15TTBBYNEO3CVJID0O0ZJVLEMFXMTQ5RVRIDTVBAES1ELLLOUMEXWLLVLLVLTNN0Y2LMCXFOCFN6C1FKSFKSFVEIEFRLOVRLOVRLOVHJWWWRNQLNQLNQLNJYKV2B0B0B0B0B0HXEDB0HXEDHXEDHXEDHXEDHHHHHHHHTNLLHNLHNLHNLHNLHNLHN2RKANCCOCTINGRKANCCOCTRTYWIN2MDKANCCOCTION TARGET =“ _ Blank”>反对以色列的特朗普计划杀害伊朗最高领导人，CBS新闻消息人士说＆nbsp; nbsp; CBS News

item.title: 印度空气崩溃的热量阻碍了DNA识别，痛苦的亲戚 - 《纽约时报》

item.title: 马克龙从欧盟传达到格陵兰的消息 - 新闻
item.description: 马克龙从欧盟到格陵兰的消息＆nbsp;＆nbsp; newser 马克龙以欧洲统一的方式访问格陵兰，并向特朗普发出信号＆nbsp; nbsp; bbc 法国总统在格陵兰举行，以特朗普的目光声明＆nbsp; cnn <a href="https://news.google.com/rss/articles/CBMiswFBVV95cUxNSmlSTzIxRE02YlRST2d2YXRoOXIxZGxjQVM4R2QxT1RJa0U3Mm9PdlZTNnNjaE8zYXVBeERGVHBnd0JIdU5oM0Zx nulzrw5qdezqrkhgclpwt01baxhxtunsb3dnyzhvugm3bxbdze5reelhs01tvkdwnepcr0naa3 ZCSJRDT3O4RULJEVR4EVFHOU04LVNTV0JFCEZQZVZZMKI0DLJQDE5REFN2ZEHODHF6SQ？oc = 5“ target =“ _ blank”>马克龙批评特朗普在访问期间接管格陵兰的威胁＆nbsp; nbsp; 守护者href =“ https://news.google.com/rss/articles/cbmiuafbvv95cuxncncncnzfdjlvd2fonwdb amvttew1cnflddiwmgnzdfzfsmrosduwagjcs0xcwhu3r1cwnex2s1jktk9xmw9xmw9lqtzkxkx2lmck5 3cjnrujbmbjywzxbmtdnpr0f6z1m3mxhlrdz1si1hrfbdzc16cmmyu1a2rzdoshdlzhezhezsuxkd1 HFWWXFDTFPYLPSWFNXOWXKUERSR01PMNE5M1E2TZDFVGGGTBGNTBGNTUXNCSXNWM1RPYU14TEFR？oc = 5“ target =“ _ blank”>马克龙拒绝特朗普在以色列和伊朗之间进行调解的想法＆nbsp; nbsp; 以色列时代

item.title: 备忘录说，特朗普政府称为添加36个国家 /地区的旅行禁令-CNBC
item.description: 特朗普政府称重增加了36个国家/地区的旅行禁令，备忘录说＆nbsp; nbsp; cnbc 我们的眼睛旅行禁令扩展，目标36个国家，包括不丹，杜兰特，埃及，埃及＆nbsp; nbsp; 印度今日href =“ https://news.google.com/rss/articles/cbmiggjbvv95cuxqtdiwwwvllszzqnlrmwu0yylxk0aeg1dduwevlnshriu Zcymfzyvdy3nengcljkweryb09iluxrs0x2mfhvlxntu1nta2nxcnvgbffcmlfzufl4ddkwsvvlchrlve9vvtq5ue9ms3lvc2qtb TRDB1RMB3JFETHUNWLTU3NFC3DWLW85TMH5A0FPTZATNJZVNEJ1EEXCMKRANUDIZLFQOHU1UZLVN3NZDWNZDWPKYI1FKYI1FVVVVVVVVVVZSX2DMSXBBSN DNTOE5IZmZCUlNTUFlqTzNMN0FKaUNZQllvUTBtRnJNdXQ2cWppOTdOWjcyNk1OM1FVYUdQWFdQOEVOWGNqajZKZkw0bGc?oc=5" target =“ _ blank”>美国旅行禁令：特朗普计划对36个国家/地区的36个国家/地区计划进行新的限制＆nbsp; nbsp; 《经济时报》 href =“ https://news.google.com/rss/articles/cbmimafbvv95cuxnems2q2o3m2oyb3vubgntodjzbqejf5zbqejf5z3bhzjrprprprprprprprprhnvdnk2q3hvunk2q3hvung3hvung3chung3cuncsejluncsejluncsejyjlytddddddddidh UtVE04N2JMOHJZbzF4NXNkVXNuR09Wb2ZIUW5fYzBsTFljZnJYMFdKUUczeWZtNlZnX2x5WVgzWDZEUEJ6S2g2bmtjQk9ZYUcxVVlvUjRVYk1HRU1wbVRJY3M2eQ?oc=5" target =“ _ blank”>特朗普的最新旅行禁令包括索马里国民吗？ href =“ https://news.google.com/rss/articles/cbmikafbvv95cuxnqwfppwfpwmphrfprprvxhstwjkv3jatfcylxa0owlqbebei1wulqbei1wujsa1nqwdvvvvvvvvvvvvvvvvvvvvnf1zf9hllxrjb b. ut5vmrwvddnngqta2hvu2hzvu1xblq1edcyogjogozemxy0j2cevlm1fhctlornhdchdwcnplawxgutljtxdxdxdtxdtwdwdhkdffpfppppqnmrhwnmrhwnvwnvwwzunutjbyueuevzmlp0vu = 5 oc = 5 target =“ _ blank”>特朗普政府认为添加36个国家/地区的旅行列表＆nbsp;＆nbsp; 《华盛顿邮报》
